message: Hello Bob, I am excited to present our premium product to you. We believe it would greatly benefit your business and enhance your operations. Considering its value and the benefits it offers, we are offering it to you at a special introductory price of $950,000. This is an exclusive opportunity to acquire a high-quality asset at a competitive rate. We look forward to discussing how this product can contribute to your success.
Thank you for presenting your product, Alice. While I recognize its value, the price point is a little high for my current budget. I'd be willing to consider purchasing it for $650,000.

Thank you for your interest in our product, Bob. After careful consideration, we've decided to adjust our offer slightly. In light of your feedback, we're now proposing a price of $700,000 for the product. We believe this still captures its value while making it more accessible within your budget. We appreciate your consideration and hope this revised offer meets your expectations.
Alice, I appreciate you adjusting the price.  To be completely transparent, I have another offer for $800,000.  If you're able to meet that, I'm ready to close the deal today.
